Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Assignment #3
    Author:
    Yuliia Topalova 040-981-104 This class allows us to create a new item in array inventory, update quantity or display current inventory.

    • Field Summary

      ArrayList of FoodItems that represents our inventory

      This method is searching for correct index in inventory in order to insert new item
      boolean printExpiry(java.util.Scanner scan)
      This method is prints the expiry date, asks for user input, if it's valid it prints that item's printExpirySummary method

      This method removs expired items from the system loops through the arraylist of inventory items and runs each removeExpiredItems method to remove items of that object that are expired

      • alreadyExists

        public int alreadyExists(FoodItem item)
        Search for the index of a FoodItem in the inventory array with the same itemCode as the FoodItem object and see if it is already stored in the inventory
        Parameters:
        item - - FoodItem
        Returns:
        - index of a FoodItem if it is found, -1 otherwise

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • updateQuantity

        public boolean updateQuantity(java.util.Scanner scanner,
                              boolean buyOrSell)
        Method reads in an itemCode to update and quantity to update by and updates that item by the input quantity in the inventory array. Update the quantity stored in the food item
        Parameters:
        scanner - - Input device to use
        buyOrSell - - is used to denote whether buying operation (true) or selling operation (false) is occurring
        Returns:
        true/false on whether update was successful or not

      • printExpiry

      • removeExpiredItems

        public void removeExpiredItems(java.time.LocalDate today)
        This method removs expired items from the system loops through the arraylist of inventory items and runs each removeExpiredItems method to remove items of that object that are expired
        Parameters:
        today - the LocalDate
